summary: The course 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate' is a hybrid program offered by Bar-Ilan University, allowing participants to attend either on-campus or via Zoom. It is designed for individuals with prior AWS Practitioner certification or equivalent knowledge. The course spans 20 sessions, totaling 100 academic hours, and covers a comprehensive range of topics related to cloud architecture. These include introducing cloud architecting, adding storage, compute, and database layers, creating and connecting networking environments, securing user and application access, implementing elasticity, high availability, and monitoring, automating architecture, caching content, building decoupled architectures, microservices, and serverless architectures, planning for disaster recovery, and preparing for AWS certification. The program aims to provide advanced knowledge and skills in cloud computing, culminating in a high-level certification in the field.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is designed to prepare participants for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate certification. It provides comprehensive training on cloud architecture, focusing on AWS services and best practices. Participants will gain hands-on experience in designing scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud solutions.

TARGET AUDIENCE: This course is intended for individuals seeking advanced knowledge in cloud architecture and those aiming to achieve AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate certification.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University. For further details, contact Esther Asulin at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

PREREQUISITES: Participants must have completed AWS Practitioner training or possess equivalent knowledge.

CERTIFICATIONS: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate.

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: November 1, 2024.
- Duration: 20 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 100 hours.
- Schedule: Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes will be held both on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on participants' preference.

TUITION AND FEES: Not specified in the provided text.

COURSE TOPICS:
- Welcome to AWS Academy Cloud Architecting.
- Introducing Cloud Architecting.
- Adding a Storage Layer.
- Adding a Compute Layer.
- Adding a Database Layer.
- Creating a Networking Environment.
- Connecting Networks.
- Securing User and Application Access.
- Implementing Elasticity, High Availability, and Monitoring.
- Automating Your Architecture.
- Caching Content.
- Building Decoupled Architectures.
- Building Microservices and Serverless Architectures.
- Planning for Disaster.
- Bridging to Certification.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:
- Contact Number: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which specializes in dedicated programs for advanced technological education.
